item.title: Pentagon says troops can only be exempt from shaving their facial hair for a year
item.description: Defense Secretary Pete Hegseth has ordered that troops who need an exemption from shaving their facial hair for longer than a year should now be kicked out of the service.

Suspect in Kirk killing charged with aggravated murder as prosecutor says DNA found on gun trigger
